page.title: 19SOCIAL SURVEY 3
page.content: { 73%}of the households surveyed had a {pet animal}with{cats}proving the most popular, then{dogs.} The village population was well established with{47%}having lived there for{more than 20 years}but{only {18% were second generation.}Most however{(40%)}came from the surrounding area. {Shopping}habits showed that the {village}and nearby{Pershore}were favoured for{food}but{Worcester}and {Cheltenham}were favoured for{clothes and larger items. {Village amenities}were quite well used. The{shop}was frequented daily by most of those surveyed with the{pub, {garage}and{church}less well used.
